Text: Thank you very much, again, again and again

Finally they arrived, so i can continue decode the movie files of these, only 2 eps from the season 2 missing:
Episode 206: Rojo, The Firetruck
Episode 218: Yes We Can!
Anyone who have these and will transfer me will have the whole S2 first before it become public and can help me seed for the world.
Also thanks for the series, its very good. I hope we dont have to wait this long for the next one.
Thank you for these, about to search for the earlier ones that I missed, only got 22 -25, cheers.

1st November,2006.   

I am seeding all 31 games again for a wee while - at least till we get some seeders.   

Please try to seed for a bit and keep these going.

Anyone stuck, P.M. me and I WILL seed.
please can someone seed. stuck on 98.3% for weeks. will seed for ages afterwards. cheers :D
